ingredients: 3 cups rolled oats, 1 cup brown sugar, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 2  eggs, 1 cup milk,   +   1/2 cup melted butter, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract,   +   3/4 cup dried cranberries
